string.value: #b#p9010010##k seems to have something urgent to tell you.

You must eliminate the monsters that are getting in the way of Dr. #b#p1022006##k's research and report back. 

#o0130100# #r#a98401##k 
#o1110101# #r#a98402##k
You were a great help in Dr. #b#p1022006##k's research.
Hello! Hello! Can you hear me? If you can hear me, I need a favor!

Whew! I've been yelling so much I'm all out of breath. Give me a second. Gasp... Gasp... Why have I been yelling so much you ask? It's because I have a favor to ask. Professor Winston says that the increasing number of Stumps are wreaking havoc on his research.
So please eliminate 30 #r#o0130100#s and 20 #r#o1110101#s and deliver the news to Professor #b#p1022006##k.
Are you trying to act like you can't hear me?
Eliminate 30 #r#o0130100#s and 20 #r#o1110101#s that are interefering with the Professor's research and deliver the news to Professor #b#p1022006##k.
Please eliminate 30 #r#o0130100#s and 20 #r#o1110101#s that are interfering with my research.
